code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt presents with mild fever and mild cough for 5 days. she has a history of Shortness of Breath for past 4 years. patient is a F harbor master aged 61 ys. o:Height 167 cm, Weight 54.9 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17, nose = no nasal congestion, wheeze-LU, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, all lung fields a:Shortness of Breath p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed OMS - 50 DEMAND OXYGEN nasal cannula, and ordered FEV1, FEV1/FVC, Pulse Oximetry.

s:f aged 62 yrs complains of recurrent mild cough over the past month. The patient reports mild fever. o:Height 167 cm, Weight 54 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 15, nose = no nasal congestion, wheeze-LU, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, all lung fields a:Shortness of Breath p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed OMS - 50 DEMAND OXYGEN nasal cannula, and ordered FEV1, FEV1/FVC, Pulse Oximetry.
